text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY_HIST 
    (CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	DATA_ID,
	DESCRIPTION,
	ERROR_MSG,
	STATUS) VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	',pipeline().parameters.dataId,',
	''',item().Prop_0,''',
	''',substring(replace(activity('Insert or update scoreValue').Error.Message,'''','"'),0,499),''',
	''E''
	)')

text.value:
@if(empty(split(item().Prop_0,'|')[1]),
concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY_HIST 
    (CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	DATA_ID,
	DESCRIPTION,
	ERROR_MSG,
	STATUS) VALUES (
	CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	',pipeline().parameters.dataId,',
	''',item().Prop_0,''',
	''accntId data not found'',
	''E''
	)')
,concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_UPDATE_CA_BILLING
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	ACCNT_ID,
	BILLING_ACCNT_ID,
	STATUS_CD,
	DATA_ID,
	STATUS,
	REMARK) VALUES (
	CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	''',split(item().Prop_0,'|')[1],''',
	''',split(item().Prop_0,'|')[2],''',
	''',if(empty(split(item().Prop_0,'|')[3]),'Inactive',split(item().Prop_0,'|')[3]),''',
	',pipeline().parameters.dataId,',
	''S'',
	''',
	if(empty(split(item().Prop_0,'|')[2]),'billing accntId data not found',concat(
	if(empty(split(item().Prop_0,'|')[3]),'statusCd data not found and default is Inactive',null)))
	,''');'))

text.value:
@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY
    SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY =''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	STATUS = ''E'',
	FILE_NAME = ''',pipeline().parameters.fileDatName,''',
	DESCRIPTION = ''',substring(concat('Datafactories Exception : ',replace(string(activity('Copy data to CC_BILLING_REVIEW').Error),'''','"')),0,499),'''
	WHERE DATA_ID = ',pipeline().parameters.dataId)

@concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY 
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	DATA_TYPE,
	STATUS,
	DESCRIPTION) OUTPUT INSERTED.DATA_ID VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	''',pipeline().parameters.DATA_TYPE,''',
	''P'',''Process review send billing account count ',if(greaterOrEquals(sub(pipeline().parameters.count,int(variables('offset'))),float(pipeline().parameters.limitPerRound)),pipeline().parameters.limitPerRound,sub(pipeline().parameters.count,int(variables('offset')))),''');')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY = ''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	STATUS = ''E'',
	DESCRIPTION = ''',substring(concat('CC_ReviewDataFactorySendBilingNoProcessAccountNoList Exception :',replace(activity('CC_CreateFileAndArchiveHaveDatName').Error.Message,'''','"')),0,if(less(length(replace(activity('CC_CreateFileAndArchiveHaveDatName').Error.Message,'''','"')),499),length(replace(activity('CC_CreateFileAndArchiveHaveDatName').Error.Message,'''','"')),499)),''' WHERE DATA_ID =',string(first(first(activity('insert CC_DATA_FACTORY onprocess').output.resultSets).rows).DATA_ID),';')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY = ''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	FILE_NAME = ',concat('''',variables('fileName'),''''),',
	FILE_NAME_SYNC = ',concat('''',variables('fileNameArchive'),''''),',
	FILE_PATH = ''',pipeline().parameters.outputPath,''',
	STATUS = ''S'',
	DESCRIPTION = ''',concat('Create File : ',variables('fileName'),' success'),''' WHERE DATA_ID =',string(first(first(activity('insert CC_DATA_FACTORY onprocess').output.resultSets).rows).DATA_ID),';')

value.value:
@concat('SELECT ''02|''+ COALESCE(TEMP.BILLING_ACCNT_ID+''|''+TEMP.ACCNT_NO,TEMP.BILLING_ACCNT_ID+''|'',''|''+TEMP.ACCNT_NO) AS LINE
FROM (SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID, B.ACCNT_NO
  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
 WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
   AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA''
   AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
   AND B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT IS NULL  
   AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) >= 
	(SELECT top 1 CAST(val1 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'') 	     
   AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) < 
	((SELECT top 1 CAST(val1 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'') 
	  + 
	(SELECT top 1 CAST(val3 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )
	)
UNION ALL
SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,B.ACCNT_NO
  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
 WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
   AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA''
   AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
   AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) >= 
		((SELECT top 1 CAST(val1 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'') 
		 + 
	     (SELECT top 1 CAST(val3 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )
	     )
  AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE())  <=  ( SELECT top 1 CAST(lov_val1 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CFG_LOV c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_CUSTOMER_NEW_OLD'' and lov_name = ''Existing'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )      
  AND ((B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT is null)
        or ( B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT < cast(DATEADD(month, -(SELECT top 1 CAST(val3 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y''), GETDATE()+1) As Date) )
	  ) 
UNION ALL	  
SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,B.ACCNT_NO
  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
 WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
   AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA''
   AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
  AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE())  >= ( SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' ) 
  AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) < 
		((SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg =''Y'') 
		 + 
	     (SELECT top 1 CAST(val7 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )
	     )   
  AND  ((B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT is null)
        or ( B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT < cast(DATEADD(month, (SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y''), B.BA_REGISTER_DT) As Date) )
	) 
UNION ALL
SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID, B.ACCNT_NO
  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
 WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
   AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA''
   AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
   AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE()) >= 
		((SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'') 
		 + 
	     (SELECT top 1 CAST(val7 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' )
	     )
  AND DATEDIFF(month,B.BA_REGISTER_DT,GETDATE())  >= ( SELECT top 1 CAST(val5 AS NUMERIC)  FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y'' ) 
  AND B.LAST_REVIEW_DAT < cast(DATEADD(month, -(SELECT top 1 CAST(val7 AS NUMERIC) FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE LOV_TYPE = ''CC_REVIEW_CREDIT_LIMIT'' and active_flg = ''Y''), GETDATE())+1 As Date)  
UNION ALL  
SELECT B.BILLING_ACCNT_ID ,B.ACCNT_NO
FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE B 
INNER JOIN ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_CREDIT_ASSIGN C ON C.BILLING_ACCOUNT_NUM = B.ACCNT_NO AND C.REASON_SUBCODE IN(''1863'',''1864'') AND C.ACTION_DTM < CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) 
WHERE B.CL_TYPE IN (''System Review'', ''Permanent'') 
AND B.CL_LEVEL = ''BA'' AND ISNULL(B.CREDIT_LIMIT,0) > 0
)TEMP
GROUP BY TEMP.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,TEMP.ACCNT_NO
ORDER BY TEMP.ACCNT_NO OFFSET ',variables('offset'),' ROWS FETCH NEXT ',string(int(pipeline().parameters.limitPerRound)),' ROWS ONLY')

@concat('SELECT
	''01|'' + ''',variables('processTime'),''' AS LINE  
    UNION ALL 
    SELECT T.LINE FROM (',variables('baScriptQuery'),') T
    UNION ALL 
    SELECT ''09|'' + CONVERT(varchar(255),COUNT(T2.LINE)) AS LINE FROM (',variables('baScriptQuery'),') T2; ')

text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_TEMP_FILE 
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	FILE_TYPE,
	FILE_NAME,
	FILE_NAME_ARCHIVE,
	FILE_PROCESS_TIME,
	STATUS) OUTPUT INSERTED.FILE_ID  
	VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	''',pipeline().parameters.FILE_TYPE,''',
	''',pipeline().parameters.fileDatName,''',
	''',variables('fileNameArchive'),''',
	''',variables('fileProcessTime'),''',
	''O'');')

@concat('UPDATE
	',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_TEMP_FILE 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),''')
	, LAST_UPD_BY = ''',
	pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,

	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	''',pipeline().parameters.DATA_TYPE,''',
	''P'',''Process review send billing account count ',if(greaterOrEquals(sub(pipeline().parameters.count,int(variables('offset'))),float(pipeline().parameters.limitPerRound)),pipeline().parameters.limitPerRound,sub(pipeline().parameters.count,int(variables('offset')))),''');')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY = ''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	STATUS = ''E'',
	DESCRIPTION = ''',substring(concat('CC_ReviewDataFactorySendBilingNoProcessAccountNoList Exception :',replace(activity('CC_CreateFileAndArchiveHaveDatName').Error.Message,'''','"')),0,if(less(length(replace(activity('CC_CreateFileAndArchiveHaveDatName').Error.Message,'''','"')),499),length(replace(activity('CC_CreateFileAndArchiveHaveDatName').Error.Message,'''','"')),499)),''' WHERE DATA_ID =',string(first(first(activity('insert CC_DATA_FACTORY onprocess').output.resultSets).rows).DATA_ID),';')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),''',convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY = ''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	FILE_NAME = ',concat('''',variables('fileName'),''''),',
	FILE_NAME_SYNC = ',concat('''',variables('fileNameArchive'),''''),',
	FILE_PATH = ''',pipeline().parameters.outputPath,''',
	STATUS = ''S'',
	DESCRIPTION = ''',concat('Create File : ',variables('fileName'),' success'),''' WHERE DATA_ID =',string(first(first(activity('insert CC_DATA_FACTORY onprocess').output.resultSets).rows).DATA_ID),';')

value.value:
@concat('SELECT ''02|''+ CONCAT(ROW_ID ,''|'',CREATED ,''|'',CREATED_BY ,''|'',LAST_UPD,''|'',LAST_UPD_BY 
				,''|'',ACCNT_NO ,''|'',ACCNT_CATEGORY ,''|'',ACCNT_SUB_CATEGORY ,''|'',BILL_NAME ,''|'',BILL_CYCLE 
				,''|'',INVOICING_COMPANY ,''|'',PAYMENT_METHOD ,''|'',MASTER_ACCNT_ID ,''|'',STATUS_CD 
				,''|'',BILLING_STATUS_CD ,''|'',REGISTER_DT ,''|'',ARPU ,''|'',CREDIT_GRADE ,''|'',DEBT_NEGO_FLG 
				,''|'',PAYMENT_FLAG) as LINE FROM CREDIT.TEST_CC_BILLING tcb ORDER BY ROW_ID OFFSET ',variables('offset'),' ROWS FETCH NEXT ',string(int(pipeline().parameters.limitPerRound)),' ROWS ONLY')

@concat('SELECT
	''01|'' + ''',variables('processTime'),''' AS LINE  
    UNION ALL 
    SELECT T.LINE FROM (',variables('baScriptQuery'),') T
    UNION ALL 
    SELECT ''09|'' + CONVERT(varchar(255),COUNT(T2.LINE)) AS LINE FROM (',variables('baScriptQuery'),') T2; ')

text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CHANGE_CAT_SUBCAT 
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	CHANGE_TYPE,
	STATUS,
	DESCRIPTION) VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',variables('CREDIT_USER'),''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',variables('CREDIT_USER'),''',
	''',variables('CHANGE_TYPE'),''',
	''E'',''',
	if(not(contains(string(activity('Get Config Value').output),'firstRow')),concat('Config LOV_TYPE : ',variables('LOV_TYPE'),' ,LOV_NAME : ',variables('LOV_NAME'),' Data not found.'),concat('Config ',
	if(startswith(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL2,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL2),null),',Output path(VAL2)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL5,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL5),null),',Prefix Output path(VAL5)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL6,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL6),null),',file type Output path(VAL6)',''))
	,','),substring(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL2,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL2),null),',Output path(VAL2)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL5,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL5),null),',Prefix Output path(VAL5)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL6,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL6),null),',file type Output path(VAL6)',''))
	,1,sub(length(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL2,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL2),null),',Output path(VAL2)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL5,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL5),null),',Prefix Output path(VAL5)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL6,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL6),null),',file type Output path(VAL6)',''))
	),1)),
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL2,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL2),null),',Output path(VAL2)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL5,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL5),null),',Prefix Output path(VAL5)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL6,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL6),null),',file type Output path(VAL6)',''))
	)
	,' Data not found.')),''');')
